38916.affected_area: Sylvan Lake (North of Sylvan Lake & Norglenwold)
live_updates: Our crews have restored services to the area.  Thank you for your patience!
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
38916.summary: Some customers in the North of Sylvan Lake and Norglenwold are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
38916.title: June 26 – Sylvan Lake (North of Sylvan Lake  & Norglenwold) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
38924.summary: Customers in the Clareview Campus area of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
38924.title: June 26 – Edmonton (Clareview Campus) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
